job.title: Machine Learning/ Data Science/ Data Engineer
job.description: ** Multiple Roles - Immediate Interview & Start ** W2 (Preferred). HOSPITALITY INDUSTRY CLIENT (FORTUNE COMPANY) Role:           Machine Learning/ Data Science/ Data Engineer Location:    San Francisco Bay Area (Remote work until pandemic) Duration:    Long Term Contract Job Description: ● 5+ years of industry experience or a PhD + 2 years industry experience in applied machine learning. ● Strong coding skills in Python/Java/Scala or equivalent ● Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow and popular ML frameworks like Tensorflow or Pytorch is preferred ● Solid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in production ● Experience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plus ● Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Spark is a plus ● Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow is a plus ● Industry experience building end-to-end Machine Learning Infrastructure a big plus If you are interested to pursue this opportunity, please send your updated resume to Sam@agiledatapro.com
